Pamela Rodríguez (Lima, 12 de mayo de 1983) es una cantante peruana, dos veces nominada al Grammy Latino.1 Su propuesta musical explora géneros diversos como el indice pop, pop artesanal, música peruana contemporánea y el jazz.2 Sus canciones abordan contenido social,3 la libertad del ser humano y de la mujer y temáticas intimistas.4
en: Pamela Rodriguez is a Latin Grammy Nominated artist, who is exploring the cross-cultural musical languages within her home city Lima, Peru. She records with the award winning and three time Grammy Nominee producer Greg Landau and together work to find a modern homogenous sound and a connecting thread to her music that contains a wide range of styles such as landó, festejo, Peruvian waltz, zamacueca, the Peruvian jungle's Cumbia, indie rock and reggae.
